title: Some 14% Of The World's Coral Reefs Were Lost Between 2008 And 2019, Report Says
content:
1. Some 14% Of The World's Coral Reefs Were Lost Between 2008 And 2019, Report Says  NPR
  2. The Planet Lost 14% Of Coral Reefs In 10-Year Period, Startling Report Finds  HuffPost
  3. Climate Change Is Devastating Coral Reefs Worldwide, Major Report Says  The New York Times
  4. 14% of world’s coral lost in less than a decade, study shows  The Guardian
  5. Study: In less than a decade, 14 percent of the world's coral reefs were wiped out  Yahoo News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 2008年から2019年の間に、世界のサンゴ礁の約14％が失われたとの報告がありました。
报告称2008年至2019年期间世界上约14%的珊瑚礁消失了
